info.name: United-In-Flight-Api
info.description: Documentation for the united in flight api

request.description:
This request returns a lot of interesting information including:

1. Wifi portal subscription information
2. Paid wifi subscription status
3. Flight info including speed, tempature, altitude, origin, and destination
4.Destination weather including current weather and weather forecast for the next few days

Returns various in-flight data including some cool stuff such as:

1. Whether all of the doors are closed
2. State of the pa system - in use or inactive
3. If there is weight on the wheels

and much much more.

It also contains the planes current latitude and longitude which although are in a wierd format, should be able to be used to generate zmanim.

Not sure what this does, but apperently it has to do with creating the device fingerprint for the session data.

Probably just a user-agent sniffer with no return data.

This request returns all movies and tv shows in united's media catalog.

This includes metadata
Return more information on a media item by passing in the id of the media item
returns a current image of the in-flight map
